front.title: Optimizing Micromobility Management for Active and Dormant Mobile Nodes

abstract.t: Micromobility protocols address mobile nodes (MN) movements within a particular IP network domain. This document introduces a new protocol "Optimized Micromobility Management" (OMM), to manage Micromobility for active and dormant mobile nodes. The suggested solution is based on the Hierarchical Mobile IPv6 (HMIPv6) proposal and aims to increase the mobility performance by reducing the handover latency and the packet loss.
